definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: I didn't want to labor over a photo album, too.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望在一本相簿上也去费力。

sentences.english: Pls leave message in my guestbook in new album.
sentences.chinese: 麻烦请大家到新的相簿留言版留言。

sentences.english: The impact of photo albums very much extends beyond merely recording historical moments.
sentences.chinese: 影响相簿十分延伸不仅仅是记录历史时刻。

sentences.english: We want to buy Photo Frames and Albums.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购相片框架和相簿。

sentences.english: He lost his photo album when traveling.
sentences.chinese: 他的照相簿在旅游的时候丢失了。

sentences.english: We want to buy Various Kinds of Photo Albums .
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购各种不同类型的相簿。

sentences.english: During that time, Suzie decided to open two scrapbooking stores.
sentences.chinese: 在此期间，苏茜决定开两家相簿美编商店。

sentences.english: The illustrations are photos of the toys in action, all pasted into a photo album.
sentences.chinese: 插图都是玩具在行动的照片，全部回朔到一本相簿。

sentences.english: User can show your photo albums for sharing.
sentences.chinese: 用户可于这里介绍你的相簿与大家分享。

sentences.english: Just come back from Yokohama. You can found relevant photo in my album.
sentences.chinese: 去完日本返黎，大家可以去我相簿睇相。

sentences.english: Did a scrapbook page this afternoon.
Press the first row to create a new album.
sentences.chinese: 按下首列可建立新相簿。

sentences.english: Welcome to my travel photo album.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎观赏我的旅游相簿。

definition: USB flash drive (Tw)/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
